post_content: Looking For Gamers, or otherwise LFG, is a play on the gaming lingo acronym LFG which stands for 'Looking For Group.' LFG is a social media app to help gamers of all kinds, from retro or niche genres to modern and popular franchises, find a play group.
Blah blah blah, something about puppies, blah blah blah.

post_title: Is pineapple on pizza really that bad?
post_content: Aren't we being a little hyperbolic these days about food preferences??

comments.comment_content: Have you ever tried black licorice on pizza? Get on my level.

post_content: I've been working on a project over time to create a full scale Diablo II character calcultor. Along side the calculator, I have been creating the first Diablo II public resource API to help other fans and developers create their own content or applications with ease.
